quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Do the thing you fear and the death of fear is certain.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The only way to do it is to do it.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger; anger leads to hate; hate leads to suffering.
author: Yoda

quote: Fear makes the wolf bigger than he is.
author: German Proverb

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: If you want to conquer the anxiety of life, live in the moment, live in the breath.
author: Amit Ray

quote: You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: Christian D. Larson

quote: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Don't let others tell you what you can't do. Don't let the limitations of others limit your vision. If you can remove your self-doubt and believe in yourself, you can achieve what you never thought possible.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: The way you treat yourself sets the standard for others.
author: Dr. Sonya Friedman

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Believing in yourself is not a one-time event. It's a continuous process.
author: Unknown

quote: You are the only person on earth who can use your ability.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Accept who you are; and revel in it.
author: Mitch Albom

quote: The moment you doubt whether you can fly, you cease forever to be able to do it.
author: J.M. Barrie

quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

quote: The most powerful relationship you will ever have is the relationship with yourself.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got this.
author: Chantal Sutherland

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: The first step towards success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
author: Mark Caine

quote: You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop.
author: Rumi

quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: The best way to gain self-confidence is to do what you are afraid to do.
author: Swati Sharma

quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everybody will respect you.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Anger is an acid that can do more harm to the vessel in which it is stored than to anything on which it is poured.
author: Mark Twain

quote: For every minute you remain angry, you give up sixty seconds of peace of mind.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Holding onto anger is like drinking poison and expecting the other person to die.
author: Buddha

quote: Speak when you are angry and you will make the best speech you will ever regret.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Anybody can become angry – that is easy, but to be angry with the right person and to the right degree and at the right time and for the right purpose, and in the right way – that is not within everybody’s power and is not easy.
author: Aristotle

quote: The best fighter is never angry.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: You will not be punished for your anger, you will be punished by your anger.
author: Buddha

quote: Anger is often more hurtful than the injury that caused it.
author: Unknown

quote: Anger makes you smaller, while forgiveness forces you to grow beyond what you were.
author: Cherie Carter-Scott

quote: Anger, resentment and jealousy doesn't change the heart of others-- it only changes yours.
author: Shannon Alder

quote: Anger is nothing more than an outward expression of hurt, fear and frustration.
author: Unknown

quote: Anger is often a mask for other emotions such as fear, sadness, and frustration.
author: Unknown

quote: Anger is a signal, and one worth listening to.
author: Harriet Lerner

quote: Anger is a feeling, not a behavior.
author: Unknown

quote: Anger is an acid that can do more harm to the vessel in which it is stored than to anything on which it is poured.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Anger and intolerance are the enemies of correct understanding.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: It is wise to direct your anger towards problems – not people; to focus your energies on answers – not excuses.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Anger is a natural response to feelings of hurt, betrayal, and embarrassment, but it’s important to recognize that anger can also be a defense mechanism.
author: Unknown

quote: Anger is a wind which blows out the lamp of the mind.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Anger is often a sign of love.
author: Unknown

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: Christian D. Larson

quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
author: Joshua J. Marine

quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: The only way to get through pain is to go through it.
author: Unknown

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Sadness flies away on the wings of time.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: Tears are words that need to be written.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
author: Kenji Miyazawa

quote: The pain you feel today is the strength you feel tomorrow.
author: Unknown

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: You are never alone. You are eternally connected with everyone.
author: Amit Ray

quote: The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes.
author: William James

quote: The most important relationship in your life is the relationship you have with yourself. Because no matter what happens, you will always be with yourself.
author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quote: It is better to be alone than in bad company.
author: George Washington

quote: The greatest thing in the world is to know how to belong to oneself.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Comparison is the thief of joy.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Envy is a waste of time.
author: Unknown

quote: The grass is always greener on the other side of the fence.
author: Proverb

quote: Don't waste your time on jealousy. Sometimes you're ahead, sometimes you're behind.
author: Mary Schmich

quote: Jealousy is a disease, love is a healthy condition. The immature mind often mistakes one for the other, or assumes that the greater the love, the greater the jealousy - in fact, they are almost incompatible; one emotion hardly leaves room for the other.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The best way to get something done is to begin.
author: Unknown

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Procrastination is the thief of time.
author: Edward Young

quote: Do it now. Sometimes 'later' becomes 'never'.
author: Unknown

quote: Every day may not be good, but there's something good in every day.
author: Unknown

quote: It's okay to not be okay.
author: Unknown

quote: Storms don't last forever.
author: Unknown

quote: You are stronger than you think.
author: Unknown

quote: The sun will rise and we will try again.
author: Unknown

quote: You don't have to be perfect to be amazing.
author: Unknown

quote: It's okay to take a break.
author: Unknown

quote: Hope is a powerful thing. Some say it's a different breed of magic altogether.
author: Stephanie Garber

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: Christian D. Larson

quote: You are not alone in this fight. We are all in this together.
author: Unknown
